ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Hey all! I m back from my trip. I m now taking back my charrs from Yanshosh. If I get any facts wrong, just tell me. ... He went to follow KitKat. BOOM!

Subject: I'm Back!
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

OOC: Hey all! I'm back from my trip. I'm now taking back my charrs from
Yanshosh. If I get any facts wrong, just tell me.

::DrillBit::

He went to follow KitKat. BOOM! They fell under attack. He took cover,
as KitKat gave the order to scramble. He switched his right arm to
gattaling gun mode, and returned fire.

::Hot Rod::

He finally woke up. His dreams were occupied with Feline's death. His
systems said he had been asleep for days. He started walking the base.
He noticed they were underground. He opened a comm to Zardus.
"Lord, its Hot Rod. Sorry I've been out for so long. Whats going on? And
do you have any orders?"

::Demolition::

He stayed with Havoc.
